word:
MR No. 1397 - Guidelines for Praying for the Sick; Devise Ways to Aid Nature

     (Written March 11, 1892, from North Fitzroy, Melbourne, Australia, to Dr. J. H. Kellogg.) 


     I have read with the deepest interest the letters you have sent us, and I assure you we are interested in the matter brought to our notice. I have written you a long letter, but have misplaced it, and have been unable to find it up to the present time.
